text: <extra_id_0> CD4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + T cells were stimulated for 20 min by the indicated concentrations of <extra_id_0> IL-10 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> IL-6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> at a density of 5 x 105 cells in 0.5 ml culture medium with 10 % FCS .

To examine the effect of serum <extra_id_0> IL-6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> on STAT phosphorylation , normal <extra_id_0> CD4 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> + T cells were stimulated for 20 min with 30 % active RA serum in culture medium with 40 mug / ml neutralizing goat anti - <extra_id_0> IL-6 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> polyclonal antibody ( IgG ; Techne , Princeton , NJ , USA ) or control goat IgG ( Techne ) .
Whole cell lysates were prepared by placing cells in 100 mul SDS lysing buffer ( 62.5 mM Tris-HCl [ pH 6.8 ] , 2 % SDS , 10 % glycerol , 50 mM dithiothreitol , 0.1 % bromphenol blue ) .

Then 20 mul protein samples were fractionated on 10 % SDS-polyacrylamide gels and were transferred to nitrocellulose membranes ( Amersham , Buckinghamshire , UK ) , and the membrane was blocked with 5 % skim milk in Tris-buffered saline with 0.1 % Tween 20 .

Tyrosine phosphorylation of <extra_id_0> STAT1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> STAT3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> was detected using commercial available kits ( Cell Signaling Technology , Beverly , MA , USA ) according to the manufacturer 's instructions .

Briefly , the membrane was incubated with the antibodies ( rabbit IgG ) anti - <extra_id_0> STAT1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> antibody , anti - phosphorylated tyrosine 701 of <extra_id_0> STAT1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> antibody , anti - <extra_id_0> STAT3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> antibody , and anti - phosphorylated tyrosine 705 of <extra_id_0> STAT3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> antibody , diluted as recommended at 1 / 2000 with Tris-buffered saline with 0.1 % Tween 20 with 5 % BSA .

Antibody binding was detected by horseradish peroxidase-conjugated anti-rabbit IgG antibody diluted at 1 / 4000 with Tris-buffered saline with 0.1 % Tween 20 with 5 % BSA , and was revealed using the chemiluminescence system .
Protein bands were quantified by densitometry using NIH-Image analysis , and <extra_id_0> STAT <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> phosphorylation was compared with the total amount of STAT protein .
<extra_id_0> IFN-gamma <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - stimulated Hela cells were used as a positive control for <extra_id_0> STAT1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> phosophorylation .
